title: I Woke Up Naked After Crying Myself to Sleep ~The Three Doting Dukes and The Ice Knight~ - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Josei   Mature   Romance   Smut
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Military   Multiple POV   Nobles   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   R*pe   Transported to Another World
author: 亜胡夜
description:
[I] who was unskillful at romance, was misunderstood by the person whom I finally fell in love with and was being harshly embraced. After crying myself to sleep, I woke up on the bed of an unfamiliar room. An unfamiliar man, an unfamiliar world. I certainly fell asleep while wishing for a reset. When will I wake up from this dream? As I continued to ponder, I ended up having the exact same occupation that I had in my original world (a soldier).

This is the story of love and war involving the beautiful ice knight and the three handsome dukes who are slightly peculiar.>
